name: REST API Development
description: Complete workflow for developing a REST API endpoint with proper error handling, validation, and documentation. Includes code generation, review, testing, and documentation steps.

steps.name: API Design & Planning
steps.description: Design the API endpoint structure, define request/response schemas, and plan error handling strategy

steps.name: Generate API Endpoint Code
steps.description: Implement the REST API endpoint with proper routing, request validation, error handling, and response formatting

steps.name: Code Review
steps.description: Review the generated code for best practices, security issues, performance concerns, and maintainability

steps.name: Generate Tests
steps.description: Create comprehensive unit tests and integration tests for the API endpoint covering success and error cases

steps.name: Generate API Documentation
steps.description: Create OpenAPI/Swagger documentation with examples, parameter descriptions, and response schemas

name: User Authentication
description: Comprehensive user authentication system implementation including registration, login, password reset, JWT tokens, and security features. Perfect for adding authentication to your application.

steps.name: Security Analysis & Design
steps.description: Analyze security requirements, design authentication flow, select encryption methods, and plan token management strategy

steps.name: Database Schema for Users
steps.description: Design and implement user database schema with proper indexing, constraints, and security considerations

steps.name: Authentication Service Implementation
steps.description: Implement core authentication service with password hashing, JWT token generation/validation, and session management

steps.name: Registration & Login Endpoints
steps.description: Create API endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and token refresh with proper validation

steps.name: Password Reset Flow
steps.description: Implement password reset functionality with secure token generation, email verification, and expiration handling

steps.name: Security Review
steps.description: Comprehensive security audit covering common vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, timing attacks)

steps.name: Authentication Tests
steps.description: Create comprehensive test suite covering all authentication scenarios including edge cases and security tests

name: Bug Fix Workflow
description: Systematic bug fix workflow including analysis, root cause identification, fix implementation, regression testing, and documentation. Ensures bugs are properly fixed without introducing new issues.

steps.name: Bug Analysis
steps.description: Analyze the bug report, reproduce the issue, identify affected code areas, and understand the expected vs actual behavior

steps.name: Root Cause Identification
steps.description: Deep dive into the code to identify the root cause, trace execution flow, and understand why the bug occurs

steps.name: Implement Bug Fix
steps.description: Implement the fix with minimal code changes, ensuring the solution addresses the root cause without side effects

steps.name: Code Review
steps.description: Review the fix for correctness, edge cases, potential side effects, and adherence to coding standards

steps.name: Regression Testing
steps.description: Run existing tests and create new tests to verify the fix works and doesn't break existing functionality

steps.name: Update Documentation
steps.description: Document the bug, its root cause, the fix implemented, and any lessons learned for future reference

name: Code Refactoring
description: Systematic code refactoring workflow to improve code quality, maintainability, and performance while preserving functionality. Includes analysis, refactoring, and comprehensive testing.

steps.name: Code Analysis
steps.description: Analyze existing code to identify code smells, duplications, complexity issues, and refactoring opportunities

steps.name: Refactoring Plan
steps.description: Create a detailed refactoring plan with prioritized changes, identifying patterns to apply and potential risks

steps.name: Extract Methods/Functions
steps.description: Break down large functions into smaller, focused methods with clear responsibilities and better naming

steps.name: Remove Code Duplication
steps.description: Identify and eliminate duplicate code by extracting common functionality into reusable components

steps.name: Improve Naming & Structure
steps.description: Rename variables, functions, and classes for clarity; reorganize code structure for better readability

steps.name: Code Review
steps.description: Review refactored code to ensure improvements are effective and no functionality is lost

steps.name: Test Verification
steps.description: Run all existing tests and add new tests to verify refactored code maintains original functionality

steps.name: Performance Validation
steps.description: Verify that refactoring hasn't negatively impacted performance; measure improvements if applicable

name: Test Suite Creation
description: Comprehensive test suite creation workflow for new or existing code. Includes unit tests, integration tests, and test documentation with proper coverage analysis.

steps.name: Test Planning
steps.description: Analyze code to identify test scenarios, edge cases, and coverage requirements; plan test structure and strategy

steps.name: Setup Test Framework
steps.description: Configure testing framework, setup test utilities, fixtures, and mock dependencies

steps.name: Generate Unit Tests
steps.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for individual functions and classes covering success and error cases

steps.name: Generate Integration Tests
steps.description: Create integration tests to verify component interactions and end-to-end workflows

steps.name: Edge Case Testing
steps.description: Add tests for edge cases, boundary conditions, error handling, and exceptional scenarios

steps.name: Coverage Analysis
steps.description: Run coverage analysis to identify untested code paths and ensure adequate test coverage

steps.name: Test Documentation
steps.description: Document test strategy, test cases, and how to run tests; create test reports and guidelines
